Articles.Content: I just got this game and i need help.How do i eject the module where the people are sitting in?And how do i make the parachute eject.And how do i go into space?

I would suggest to go through the in game tutorial for more help

in order to remove the command module from the rest of the ship u need to use a decoupler when the decoupler is next in line(left side) when you press space bar it will disconnect the two parts

*if the bottom part is still moving upward it will jam into the decoupler until it stops thrusting then it will fall off
All of this is done with decouplers to make stages. Spacebar advances the stages during launch.
KK thank you,now im trying to make a ship to reach orbit
